ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Help needed from players of ALL servers!
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree ;)  Must punish the 3 who spend their time killing froggies instead of joining us at the dinner.  So next outing on them ;) Zil
ygData.messageBody:
I agree ;) Must punish the 3 who spend their time killing froggies instead of joining us at the dinner. So next outing on them ;)

Zil

On Wednesday, 13 September, 2000 10:35 AM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...] wrote:
>
> Aiya oldman, u got lotsa problem ah, tell em' pilots go fly kite lah.
> I been thru it all too at em' Airforce. Next time i go in reservist, i'll
> lossen a few screws here and there and take out a few split pins too.
> How come so many late and early flying these days? last time only flying
> late morning and early afternoon. Siao On .
>
> Must have a EQ RL meeting outside. drinks, food and Girls to be supply by
> You, Fesse and Garren :P.
> as usual.. Zan can bring the toy dolls stuff.
>
> Bibi aka Druid Nukem'
